pages.privacy-policy: LuckyWheels Tours - Privacy Policy LuckyWheels Home Tours Contact Privacy Policy LuckyWheels respects the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect from users, how we use that information, and the steps we take to protect it. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from users: Personal information you provide voluntarily, such as your name and email address (if required for registration or sweepstakes entry). Non-personally identifiable information collected automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for the following purposes: To administer sweepstakes and contests. To send you promotional emails (if you opt-in). To improve the functionality of our website. To analyze website traffic and usage patterns. Data Sharing and Disclosure We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except in the following cases: As required by law or legal process. To protect the rights or safety of LuckyWheels or others. The LuckyWheels website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
